org.deeplearning4j.arbiter.optimize.api.termination

Interface TerminationCondition

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MaxCandidatesCondition, MaxTimeCondition

    public interface TerminationCondition
    Global termination condition for conducting hyperparameter optimization. Termination conditions are used to determine if/when the optimization should stop.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initialize(IOptimizationRunner optimizationRunner)
      Initialize the termination condition (such as starting timers, etc).
      boolean terminate(IOptimizationRunner optimizationRunner)
      Determine whether optimization should be terminated

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(IOptimizationRunner optimizationRunner)
        Initialize the termination condition (such as starting timers, etc).

      • terminate

        boolean terminate(IOptimizationRunner optimizationRunner)
        Determine whether optimization should be terminated
        Parameters:
        optimizationRunner - Optimization runner
        Returns:
        true if learning should be terminated, false otherwise
